desc: Building on principles learned in 113, students develop a harmonic vocabulary through analysis of seventh chords, secondary functions and common chord modulation, Studies in melody explore species counterpoint, develop through melodic reduction and phrase structure. Binary and ternary forms are also studied. Prerequisites: Music 111 and 113. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Theory II
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 111 and 113. Offered Spring Semester.
